title: Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing Mobile-Based Language Learning Technology Recommendation Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A course supporting effective utilization of mobile educational technology recommendation systems for language learning in smartphone-centric limited technological environments.

learning_goals: Learners can select technologies suitable for language learning goals (reading/writing/speaking) with over 80% accuracy using a mobile-based recommendation system.
Learners can propose over three technology-instructional method mapping strategies based on the recommendation system’s analytical results.
Learners can improve initial instructional design drafts over two times using the real-time feedback feature of the recommendation system in a smartphone environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
